testCase.name: Fee type controller GET - / should return no fees type found
Fee type controller GET - / should return all fees type
Fee type controller GET - /:id should return no fee type found
Fee type controller GET - /:id should return a fee type
Fee type controller POST - / should create a fee type
Fee type controller POST - / should return all required fields
Fee type controller POST - / should return fee type already exists
Fee type controller PUT - /:id should return no fee type found
Fee type controller DELETE - /:id should return no fee type found
Fee type controller DELETE - /:id should return a fee type deleted
Fee Schedule Controller Create Fee Schedule should return 422 if all required fields are not provided
Fee Schedule Controller Create Fee Schedule should return 400 if fee schedule already exists
Fee Schedule Controller Create Fee Schedule should return 201 if fee schedule created successfully
Fee Schedule Controller Get All Fee Schedules should return 404 if no fee schedules found
Fee Schedule Controller Get All Fee Schedules should return 200 if get all fee schedules successfully
Fee Schedule Controller Get Fee Schedule By Id should return 404 if fee schedule not found
Fee Schedule Controller Get Fee Schedule By Id should return 200 if get fee schedule by id successfully
Fee Schedule Controller Update Fee Schedule should return 404 if fee schedule not found
Fee Schedule Controller Update Fee Schedule should return 200 if update fee schedule successfully
Fee Schedule Controller Delete Fee Schedule should return 404 if fee schedule not found
Fee Schedule Controller Delete Fee Schedule should return 200 if delete fee schedule successfully
catchAsync should call next with an error if fn throws an error
catchAsync should call fn with req, res, and next
ErrorResponse should create an error response with the provided message and status code
authenticateUser middleware should return 401 error if Authorization header is missing
authenticateUser middleware should return 401 error if token is not in Bearer format
authenticateUser middleware should return 401 error if token is invalid
authenticateUser middleware should return 401 error if user is not found
authenticateUser middleware should attach user to the request object and cache the user
authenticateUser middleware should use cached user if available
SuccessResponse returns an object with the correct properties and values
FeeType API POST /api/feeType should return server is running
